participant_1.background:
I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again.
I have been working at my current job for three years, but my heart is still in the outdoors.
my husband is a pastor.
I love my leather clothes because they make me feel confident and powerful.
i hate flowers.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts.
I have been working on my car at night, trying to fix it without them knowing.
My new job in the medical field is much more fulfilling than my old job as a tour guide.
I help my grandparents with their daily activities.
I love to drive and dress up, but I get sad when I think about my dog.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going so far?
Hey there! It's going pretty well, thank you for asking. How about yours?
Not bad! I'm just working on my latest project. What are you up to?
I'm helping my grandparents with their daily activities. They are getting older and need a little extra help now.
Oh, that is nice of you! I'm sure they appreciate it.
They do! I love them very much.
I can tell! What kind of work do you do?
I'm a medical professional. I just started a new job in the field and I'm really enjoying it.
That sounds awesome! I'm in the process of changing careers myself.
Oh really? What are you going to do?
I'm not sure yet. I'm looking into a few different options.
Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out. You seem like a smart person.
You're welcome! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go out and explore new places. I also like to read and play video games.
Oh, that's cool! I love to go to concerts and listen to music.
That sounds fun! I like to listen to music too. I'm a big fan of country music.
Oh, I love country music too! I'm a big fan of Luke Bryan and Miranda Lambert.
Me too! They're both great artists
